DOC.brief_summary: The intervention will consist in a 6 week of pilates practice in older population to check the prevention of fall effectiveness.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Pilates in Risk Fall in Older Population
DOC.detailed_description: A study population of elder people will be randomly allocated to intervention or control group, consisted in Pilates and a booklet of balance tips respectively. The protocol will be performed for 6 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Elder population. Not to be a pilates practitioner previous to study enrollment. Cognitive issues that dont allow to practice pilates method. Sensorial alteration or any disease that could altered balance. Any drug or medication that modify balance.
